backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing admin registration and officer records with add, update, remove, list, and message‑payload query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test references for messaging and officer actions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend pages and components.
frontend/ARDUINO_DEVICE_INTEGRATION.md: Guide explaining Arduino data collection, Firebase telemetry upload, and GSM/GPRS SMS alert behavior.
frontend/FIREBASE_RTDB_FIELDS.md: Reference detailing expected Firebase RTDB field structure, sensor aliases, and Arduino write requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the app root, metadata, PWA tags, icons, and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, theme, icons, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching with a network‑first strategy for PWA support.
frontend/PWA_AND_LOCAL_RUN.md: Instructions for installing the app as a PWA and running the project locally with required tools.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures public and protected routes using TanStack Router and wraps the app with a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/FirebaseTe: Provides a UI action to initialize Firebase telemetry fields and displays success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/charts/LineTrend: Renders a temperature and humidity line chart or an empty-state message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/charts/StatusPie: Displays a pie chart summarizing alert status levels using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alerts: Shows critical, warning, or normal system alerts based on current alert status and telemetry.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Displays sensor summary cards for key telemetry values with demo-mode fallback formatting.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Office: Generates alert messages and allows copying, WhatsApp messaging, or SMS sending to selected officers.
frontend/src/components/officers/Officer: Dialog form for adding or editing an officer with input validation and Firebase-backed submission.
Displays a table of officers with actions for edit, delete, copy number, WhatsApp, and SMS, using deletion and dialog hooks.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportsC: Renders a bar chart of warnings and critical alerts for monthly or yearly aggregated data.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportsT: Shows a summary table of aggregated report data with totals and period-based columns.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficers.ts: Convenience hooks that expose officer list, add/update, and delete operations backed by Firebase queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for fetching, upserting, and deleting officers in Firebase, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTelemetry.ts: Subscribes to Firebase telemetry data, normalizes fields, manages time series, and updates a shared store with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines CSS variables for themes, and adds fade and pulse animations.
frontend/src/lib/alertStatus.ts: Evaluates telemetry to classify prediction and prevention alert levels based on fire-risk conditions.
frontend/src/lib/captcha.ts: Generates a random 6‑character captcha using a restricted alphanumeric set.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides an async helper to copy text to the clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/demoTelemetry.ts: Returns demo telemetry values and generates randomized hourly time‑series data.
frontend/src/lib/firebase.ts: Defines Firebase config and a mock RTDB interface that polls REST endpoints and manages listeners.
frontend/src/lib/geo.ts: Validates lat/lng bounds and formats coordinates to six decimals.
frontend/src/lib/officersRtdb.ts: Implements CRUD helpers for officers in Firebase RTDB via REST with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/lib/reporting.ts: Aggregates telemetry into monthly or yearly warning and alert counts, with demo-mode randomization.
frontend/src/lib/sms.ts: Builds SMS deep links, triggers SMS app navigation, and generates default officer messages.
frontend/src/lib/telemetryBootstrap.ts: Initializes default telemetry fields in Firebase RTDB root via a PATCH merge request.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates sanitized WhatsApp deep links and attempts to open chats with optional prefilled text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query, loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying telemetry, alerts, charts, summary cards, GPS info, and demo-mode handling.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with credential validation, captcha, and session initialization before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Map.tsx: Map page showing GPS coordinates, copy-to-clipboard support, and an embedded OpenStreetMap view with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/pages/Officers.tsx: Officers directory with search, listing, and dialog for adding new officer records.
frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx: Reports page rendering monthly/yearly aggregated telemetry trends with charts, tables, and demo mode.
frontend/src/pages/Splash.tsx: Splash/landing screen presenting branding and a start button that navigates to login.
frontend/src/state/authSession.ts: Simple auth session utilities for login, logout, and checking authentication via localStorage.
frontend/src/state/telemetryStore.ts: Zustand store holding telemetry data and a setter for global state updates.
frontend/src/types/telemetry.ts: Telemetry and time-series TypeScript interfaces defining sensor and historical data shapes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata for a forest-fire monitoring web app, including schema notes, features, known issues, and system architecture requirements.
